sentences.sContent: a company with an exemplary record on environmental issues
sentences.sCn: 在处理环境问题方面可作为楷模的公司

sentences.sContent: ...Romanians and members of other so-called inferior races became exemplary Americans and contributed greatly...

synos.tran: 典范的；惩戒性的；可仿效的

trans.tranCn: 可作楷模的， 典范的
trans.tranOther: excellent and providing a good example for people to follow
